title: Emprez BI - "The module being expired, some of the features are limited."
content: Since 9/9/21 Emprez has offered you a free trial of the brand new Emprez BI module.This trial period is coming to an end, that's why you see the message "The module being expired, some of the features are limited" on your dashboard.ðŸ›’ If you want to subscribe to this new module, you can order it right here: Order Emprez BIThe amount is $1.50/month/employee.If you do not wish to subscribe, no problem, the message and the module will disappear automatically in the coming weeks from your Emprez space.We would love to hear your opinion on how to improve this new feature, it's overÂ here!Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
